items.sentence: I\'ve got some things I want to do right now.
Tom told me that Mary got married last month.
Tom told me that he saw someone kissing Mary.
Tom told me that he thought Mary knew French.
Tom told me that he wants to meet my parents.
You\'re the only person I know who\'s my age.
You\'re the tallest person here, aren\'t you?
You\'re too young to drink beer, aren\'t you?
You\'re very good at doing that, aren\'t you?
Tom said he wouldn\'t want to live in Boston.
Tom said he\'d come to see us this afternoon.
Tom said he\'d do his homework before dinner.
We have a lot of things that need to be done.
We have a problem that we need to talk about.
We have an office located in downtown Boston.
We have been studying French for three years.
This building has 5 floors and 20 apartments.
Tom also broke his big toe on his right foot.
Tom always sits in the back of the classroom.
We hung a Christmas wreath on the front door.
